articles.title: Spotify Wrapped: Harry Styles had the most-streamed song of 2022 - BBC
articles.description: The star's smash hit single As It Was tops the year-end charts on Apple Music, Spotify and Deezer.
articles.content:
Harry Styles' introspective-but-gossipy pop smash As It Was has been named the UK's most-streamed song of 2022.
Spotify, Apple Music and Deezer all said the track was their top performer of the year… [+4211 chars]

articles.title: Three Minutes: A Lengthening review – fragments of a Jewish town destroyed by war - The Guardian
articles.description: The forensic analysis of home-movie footage shot in a small community in 1938 Poland is the subject of Bianca Stigter’s arresting documentary
articles.content: Perhaps a deepening is closer to the mark. This arresting film is about a vivid process of reconstruction, or recontextualisation, like finding a fragment of an Etruscan pot in the soil and imagining… [+2005 chars]
